arts.ttl: Advertising boards & chaos - how Sunderland stopped Arsenal machine
arts.sum: Moving advertising boards and causing chaos - how brilliant Sunderland stopped the Arsenal machine.

arts.ttl: Arsenal’s result vs Sunderland matters a lot less when you realise what 72-touch star did
arts.sum: Arsenal dropped points in disappointing fashion against Sunderland on Saturday evening, although one of Mikel Arteta’s players produced an excellent performance. Brian Brobbey scooped home...

arts.ttl: Sunderland battle for draw as Arsenal's winning streak ends
arts.sum: Brian Brobbey scores a dramatic injury-time equaliser for Sunderland in a 2-2 draw in the Premier League, as Arsenal concede their first goals since September to end a run of ten consecutive wins in all competitions.

arts.ttl: Arteta explains how Sunderland created ‘chaos’ in Arsenal draw
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta praised Sunderland for their ability to create “chaos” with free kicks, long throws and direct balls against Arsenal on Saturday. The Black Cats held the Premier League leaders at the Stadium of Light, taking the lead in the first half before coming from behind late on to draw 2-2. Play-off final hero Dan […] The post Arteta explains how Sunderland created ‘chaos’ in Arsenal draw first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: “It’s outstanding” James McFadden comments on Arsenal’s draw at Sunderland
arts.sum: James McFadden expressed admiration for the performances of both Sunderland and Arsenal when the two sides met in the Premier League today. The Gunners faced a Black Cats team that appeared ready to match them every step of the way, ensuring a competitive and entertaining contest. After falling behind early in the match, Arsenal responded […] The post “It’s outstanding” James McFadden comments on Arsenal’s draw at Sunderland appeared first on Just Arsenal News.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta gives clear Arsenal response to Sunderland draw - 'not our standards'
arts.sum: Arsenal were denied an eleventh consecutive victory away to Sunderland in the Premier League after a late Brian Brobbey goal

arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris Confirms Sunderland Used Bizarre Tactic in 2-2 Draw vs Arsenal
arts.sum: Sunderland boss Regis Le Bris has admitted his side used bizarre tactics to hinder Arsenal in their 2-2 draw on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Arsenal legend points finger of blame at unlikely star for mistake in Sunderland draw
arts.sum: Arsenal let what was potentially a priceless win slip through their fingers after conceding a late equaliser away to Sunderland and David Seaman has shared his thoughts on the result

arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris enjoys ‘good lesson’ for Sunderland as his Black Cats hold Arsenal
arts.sum: An entertaining tussle saw the high-flying club snatch a point against the league-leading Gunners.

arts.ttl: Sunderland 2-2 Arsenal: Daniel Ballard Breaks Arsenal Hearts
arts.sum: Roefs went long, Ballard unnerved Rice in an aerial duel, and then ran onto a Mukiele knockdown before hammering the ball into the back of the net beyond Raya. However, the hosts deserved something of the spoils from this clash, and Brian Brobbey produced an equaliser in the final moments, stopping a five game winning streak in the league for the Gunners .
